item.title: Common lungwort (*Pulmonaria officinalis*)
item.description: Common lungwort is a medicinal plant that grows in spring and blooms in pink and purple colours. The tincture and tea from Pulmonaria officinalis are used to treat respiratory ailments, coughs and hoarseness.

item.title: Denseflower mullein (*Verbascum densiflorum*)
item.description: Denseflower mullein or Verbascum densiflorum is a biennial medicinal plant traditionally used to relieve cough, bronchitis, and inflammations of the throat and ear. Most often, its flowers are collected, and less commonly its leaves and roots.
